short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do not use this extension unless you wish to be SPOOKED!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This web extension, when enabled, will convert all of the HTML text on any loaded page into strings only consisting of the word "SPOOKY!". (The perfect extension for Halloween!)

(This a very SPOOKY web extension; please only use it if you wish to get SPOOKED!)
